pr_title: [#714]Fix query parameter construction of org member filter

timeline.message: [#714]Fix query parameter construction of org member filter

timeline.bodyText: The bug was for listMembersWithFilter.  Can you add a test for that as well?
timeline.author: bitwiseman

timeline.bodyText: Go ahead and be specific about size and who is in the list.  A check for non-empty list is not going to be enough to ensure this doesn't break in the future.
timeline.author: bitwiseman

timeline.message: [#714]More specific assertions; Add test for members with filter
